title: Armed Man Shot Dead at Mar-a-Lago
summary: Secret Service agents killed a 21-year-old carrying a shotgun and fuel canister who breached the inner perimeter. Trump was not present.
content:

At 1:30 AM, a man carrying a **shotgun and a fuel canister** entered the secured perimeter at Mar-a-Lago.

Secret Service agents and a Palm Beach County deputy **shot and killed him.**

The suspect: **Austin T. Martin**, 21, from North Carolina.

His family had reported him missing on Saturday. He appears to have driven to Florida and purchased the weapon en route.

He got in through the **north gate** â€” slipping past when a guest was leaving the property.

## 0 | Other casualties. Trump was in Washington, not Florida.

Attorney General Pam Bondi said she had been in contact with the president and was coordinating with federal partners.

The motive remains unknown.

>> "I'm grateful the president and law enforcement officers are safe." â€” AG Pam Bondi

This is the second major security incident at Mar-a-Lago in recent years, after the 2024 golf course incident.

!! A 21-year-old drove across state lines with a shotgun and a fuel can to breach a presidential residence at 1:30 AM. The questions that remain are more troubling than the ones we can answer.
